notes.serena_configuration: Serena MCP provides semantic code search and editing capabilities with LSP integration. It runs via uvx and requires no separate installation. The read_only setting controls whether Serena can modify files (false for build mode, true for plan/review modes). This is substituted dynamically in mode-specific configs.
notes.project_path: SERENA_PROJECT_PATH should be set to {project_root}/.serena where Serena will store indexes and project-specific configuration.
notes.environment_variables: SERENA_READ_ONLY controls read-only mode. Set to 'true' for plan/review (no edits), 'false' for build (allow edits). This is substituted dynamically in mode-specific configs.
